titles.title: To prohibit providing Federal funds for the National Endowment for the Humanities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Training.

term.name: National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities

bill.summary: 7/25/2014--Introduced. Prohibits any federal funds from being made available to the National Endowment for the Humanities.
